text: Khao Thong railway station is a railway station located in Khao Thong Subdistrict, Phayuha Khiri District, Nakhon Sawan. It is located 235.493 km from Bangkok railway station and is a class 3 railway station. It is on the Northern Line of the State Railway of Thailand. The station opened on 31 October 1905 as part of the Northern Line extension from Lop Buri to Pak Nam Pho. ==Train services== * Ordinary 201/202 Bangkok-Phitsanulok-Bangkok * Ordinary 207/208 Bangkok-Nakhon Sawan-Bangkok * Ordinary 211/212 Bangkok- Taphan Hin-Bangkok * Local 401/402 Lop Buri-Phitsanulok-Lop Buri == References == * Ichirō, Kakizaki (2010). Ōkoku no tetsuro: tai tetsudō no rekishi. Kyōto: Kyōtodaigakugakujutsushuppankai. * Otohiro, Watanabe (2013). Tai kokutetsu yonsenkiro no tabi: shasō fūkei kanzen kiroku. Tōkyō: Bungeisha. Category:Railway stations in Thailand
title: Khao Thong railway station
